summary: The diff only updates project_state.json to record pending requests; it does not replace or add the logo asset at frontend/public/assets/logo-job.jpg, so REQ-1 is not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the existing static logo asset so that all current usages display the newly uploaded logo image (ensure frontend/public/assets/logo-job.jpg exists and is included in the build, with no src path changes).
missing_requirements.reason: No asset file changes are present in the diff; only project_state.json was modified. There is no evidence that frontend/public/assets/logo-job.jpg was added/replaced or that the build will include the new image.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/updated project tracking entries (AR-1, AR-2) marking the logo replacement request(s) as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest asked to replace the logo asset; it did not request adding project management metadata or new_feature_requests entries.
